document_data.mainbody:
Dorbulgruf Shalescar () was the speaker of Bremen during the late 15 century DR.
He was an even-tempered individual who always welcomed those that visited his town.
Originally from Ironmaster, Dorbulgruf moved to Bremen after an accident in the mines made him realized he needed to move above ground.
After Bremen was partially destroyed in a flood, he was unrelenting in his efforts to help with reconstruction efforts. After earning the towns respect and their gratitude, Dorbulgruf was nominated as its speaker.
